00011 #include "osm-parse.h"
00012 
00013 #include <QString>
00014 #include <QFile>
00015 #include <QDebug>
00016 #include <QXmlStreamReader>
00017 
00022 void OsmData::parse(QString filename)
00023 {
00024     QFile f(filename);
00025     f.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly);
00026     parse(&f);
00027     f.close();
00028 }
00029 
00033 void OsmData::parse(QFile *file)
00034 {
00035     bool keep = false;
00036     int i = 0;
00037     int kept = 0, discarded = 0, nodes_referenced = 0;
00038     QXmlStreamReader xml(file);
00039     while (!xml.atEnd()) {
00040         xml.readNext();
00041         if (xml.isEndElement() && xml.name() == "way") {
00042             if (keep) {
00043                 ways->append(currentWay);
00044                 foreach(OsmNodeId nodeid, currentWay.nodes) {
00045                     (*nodes)[nodeid].incOrder();
00046                 }
00047                 nodes_referenced += currentWay.nodes.count();
00048                 kept++;
00049             } else {
00050                 discarded++;
00051             }
00052             continue;
00053         }
00054 
00055         if (!xml.isStartElement()) continue;
00056 
00057         i++;
00058         if ((i & 65535) == 0) qDebug() << i;
00059         if (xml.name() == "tag") {
00060             if (wayTags.contains(xml.attributes().value("k").toString())) {
00061                 keep = true;
00062             }
00063             continue;
00064         }
00065 
00066         if (xml.name() == "node") {
00067             nodes_total++;
00068             OsmNodeId nodeid = xml.attributes().value("id").toString().toInt();
00069             (*nodes)[nodeid] = OsmNode(
00070                 xml.attributes().value("lat").toString().toFloat(),
00071                 xml.attributes().value("lon").toString().toFloat());
00072             continue;
00073         }
00074 
00075         if (xml.name() == "way") {
00076             keep = false;
00077             currentWay.clear();
00078             currentWay.setId(xml.attributes().value("id").toString().toInt());
00079         }
00080 
00081         if (xml.name() == "nd") {
00082             currentWay.addNode(xml.attributes().value("ref").toString().toInt());
00083         }
00084     }
00085     qDebug() << "Kept:" << kept << "Discarded:" << discarded <<  "Noderefs:" << nodes_referenced << "Nodes:" << nodes_total;
00086 }
